[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”39012″ img_size=”1200×450″ qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

INTERSTATE COLLABORATIONS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580398310667{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

UNIWA, in the context of its international orientation, lays particular emphasis on the implementation of transnational and inter-institutional collaborations with universities, research centers and foreign bodies.

Partnerships, aimed primarily at offering joint programs of study with other Higher Education Institutions, promote scientific research, transfer of know-how practices and scientific data as well as promoting the mobility of academic staff and students.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
